SELECT LPAD(FLOOR(RAND() * 1000000), 6, '0') as code
INSERT INTO sys_code (email, code, createTime) VALUES (#{email}, #{code}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM sys_code WHERE code = #{code} AND email = #{email} AND createTime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL 10 MINUTE) ORDER BY createTime DESC LIMIT 1
